change to complete_collection_levelThis finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace 2018-11-26T19:13:21EnglishDescribing Archives: A Content Standard
Brooklyn Historical Society
Charles Goater papers
Goater, Charles
1977.404
0.01 Linear Feet in two folders.
1860 One letter of administration naming Charles Goater of Sydney, New South Wales, Australia as executor of the will of Thomas Sheppard of the same place, dated January 13, 1865. Goater's son, Walter Goater (1852-1933), later lived in Brooklyn, N.Y., where he worked as an artist and illustrator and was married to Anne (Carr) Goater (1858-1933). One 1860 letter from Charles Goater to brother describing movements of family members, residences, and the landscape of Brooklyn. The letter also contains replies from Charles' father, J.P. Goater, and other family members. It is not known if Charles Goater himself ever resided in Brooklyn. A0068
Conditions Governing Access
Open to users without restriction.
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date (if known); Charles Goater papers, 1977.404, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Gift of Virginia Ward Nichols, 1944.
Processing Information
Material found in repository added to collection by Lena Evers-Hillstrom in November 2018. The name of the collection was updated at this time to better reflect the contents of the collection.
Decedents' estates |z Australia |z Sydney (N.S.W.) Letters of administration Sydney (N.S.W.) Goater, Charles
